text: Mauricio Galvao (21 January 1890 - 6 March 1945) was a German field hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was killed in action during World War II. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1945 deaths Category:German male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Germany Category:Field hockey players at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players from Buenos Aires
title: Mauricio Galvao
